description:
The game is played simply by rotating the map's outer ring.
Bounce the ball and destroy the gems within the time limit.

If you manage to destroy the PRISM GEM, you will go into Fever Time. This will trigger an opportunity to destroy a BONUS GEM to get bonus points!

Try to improve your score by upgrading the ball and by using items!
name: GEM CRASH
intro:
A brick breaker game with a unique twist! 
With 360 degrees of potential moves, 
destroy the gems scattered throughout the level!
